short_summary: Biological fish sampling, fish, seal and beluga stomach content analysis
description: Objectives of the Requirement: The contractor will use proper scientific protocols to provide targeted analysis including taxonomic identification, biological sampling, laboratory services, and pathological laboratory services. The contractor will also be responsible for processing degraded and partial samples, performing fish ageing, and conducting other analyses as required.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Biological Fish Sampling and Stomach Content Analysis

**Reference Number:** CB-869-66875828

**Amendment Number:** 3

**Tender Closing Date:** December 11, 2023 (13:00:00)

**Notice of Tender:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites proposals for biological fish sampling and stomach content analysis. The contractor will use scientific protocols to conduct targeted analysis of Arctic fish, seals, whales, belugas and other species.

**Purpose and Objectives:**

The scope of work involves six separate researchers providing frozen samples to the contractor for processing, including:
- Fish and seal sample processing
- Stomach content analysis
- Otolith extraction
- Data analysis

**Description of Requirements:**

- Taxonomic identification of Arctic benthic marine invertebrates, zooplankton, and marine fish species
- Pathogen and parasite infracommunity identification and analysis
- Morphometric data analysis
- Fecundity analysis
- Fish ageing of Arctic and sub-Arctic species
- Stomach content analysis of whales, seals, fish, and large invertebrates

**Selection Criteria:**

- Highest technical merit within a stipulated maximum budget
- Quality of bid
- Compliance with technical requirements

**Contracting Entity:**

- [Fisheries and Oceans Canada](https://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/)
- 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick
- E3C 2M6

**Contact Information:**
- Karen Dolan ( [DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca ), 782-377-7245)

**Additional Information:**

- This is an open tender. It may be conditionally set-aside under the PSIB if two or more bids from certified Indigenous businesses are received.
- Bidders must be certified under the PSIB criteria and listed in the Government's Indigenous Business Directory.

**Attachments:**
- Request for Proposal (RFP) document available at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)


Please note that the re-written text only includes the relevant information from the original document and removes unnecessary sections for conciseness. The text is also rephrased in a more professional tone and formatted with Markdown for readability.
